name: apt17

procedures: T1583.006::[APT17] has created profile pages in Microsoft TechNet that were used as C2 infrastructure.
T1585::[APT17] has created and cultivated profile pages in Microsoft TechNet. To make profile pages appear more legitimate, [APT17] has created biographical sections and posted in forum threads.

description: [APT17](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0025) is a China-based threat group that has conducted network intrusions against U.S. government entities, the defense industry, law firms, information technology companies, mining companies, and non-government organizations. (Citation: FireEye APT17)
